mapper.sql: id, business_type, nationality, industry_type, register_address,register_address_level, register_address_province,register_address_city, register_address_district, register_address_street, operate_address, belocated_address, level, million_building_is, inpark_name, name, contact_phone, business_volume, jobin_totalnum, on_scale_is, status, is_build_partyorg, unbuild_reason, init_is, create_time, creator, create_org,update_time,updator
mapper.update: update unpublic_org_info set unpublic_party_org_id = null where unpublic_party_org_id = #{partyOrgId} and status = '2'
mapper.select:
select main.* from unpublic_org_info main
main.status = '2' and main.unpublic_party_org_id is null and main.cover_party_org_id is null
and main.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{params.name}),'%')
and main.create_org = #{params.createOrg}
